example.eg: Jules realized that he needed to take his employer's notice concerning his poor behavior seriously.
example.egtrans: 朱尔斯意识到，他需要严肃对待老板就他不良表现的警告。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 警告, 警示, 提醒

example.eg: There were signs of trouble, but he paid them little notice until it was too late.
example.egtrans: 早就有麻烦的迹象了，不过他一直没怎么注意，等注意到时已经太晚了。

example.eg: He received notice of the foreclosure.
example.egtrans: 他收到了法院的房屋拍卖通知书。

example.eg: He just had five minutes' notice about the arrival of the train.
example.egtrans: 他刚收到提醒，说火车还有五分钟到站。

example.eg: Someone had put up a notice about new parking rules.
example.egtrans: 有人张贴了一张关于新泊车规定的告示。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通知书, 通告信, 告示

example.eg: He gave his two weeks' notice to his boss after he was offered another job.
example.egtrans: 在找到另一份工作后，他提前两周向老板交了辞职书。

example.eg: Has he noticed you yet?
Did you notice that he was drunk?
example.egtrans: 你察觉出他当时喝醉了么？

example.eg: Didn't you notice that this road is closed ahead?
example.egtrans: 你难道没意识到这条路的前方是封闭的么？

example.eg: The contract states that employees are entitled to one month's notice.
example.egtrans: 合同规定，雇员应当在遭到解雇的一个月前接到通知。

example.eg: The young author's first novel has been the focus of a great deal of notice.
example.egtrans: 这位年轻作家的第一部小说引起了人们的广泛关注。

example.eg: The string quartet received a favourable notice from the music critic.
example.egtrans: 弦乐四重奏收到了来自乐评家的好评。

example.eg: Notice the road signs ahead.
Please give advance notice if you have to cancel an appointment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提前通知, 事先通知

example.eg: This is your final notice before your electricity is shut off: please pay your bill immediately.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 最后通告, 最后通牒

dsense.name: give notice of [sth], give notice that

example.eg: The Council's letter gave notice of the election to all the voters.
example.egtrans: 委员会写信向全体选民通知本次选举。

example.eg: He gave notice because he was tired of being treated like a slave.
Albert posted a "roommate wanted" sign on the noticeboard.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 布告牌, 布告栏, 告示牌

dsense.name: on short notice, at short notice, on a moment's notice, at a moment's notice

example.eg: Her appointment was cancelled on short notice.
Supply teachers often have only short notice to prepare their lessons.
Tour prices are subject to change without notice due to currency fluctuations.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如有变更，恕不另行通知

example.eg: She took no notice of his antics.
It's time you sat up and took notice.
He took notice of all the road signs but still got lost.
The restaurant will be closed until further notice.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 直至另行通知, 在另行通知前

example.eg: I was always on time and did my job well, but my boss fired me without notice.
